portfolio.title: Cloudbook
portfolio.description1: Enabled CRUD operations, allowing users to create, read, update, and delete notes.
portfolio.description2: Ensured data privacy and security by restricting note access to their respective creators.
portfolio.description3: Successfully built a secure authentication system using JWT tokens.
portfolio.description4: Designed an intuitive signup process to facilitate new account creation.
portfolio.description5: Connected with a MongoDB database and designed schemas and models for data storage.

portfolio.title: NewsDaily
portfolio.description1: Designed a fully functional news website using ReactJS with external API data integration.
portfolio.description2: Implemented user-friendly features like news categorization, country selection, and pagination.
portfolio.description3: Showcased technical skills in ReactJS development and API utilization for enhanced web functionality.

portfolio.title: Textools
portfolio.description1: Designed a feature-rich React application for text modification.
portfolio.description2: Included functions like text case conversion, text-to-speech, word count, and estimated reading time.
portfolio.description3: Implemented a dark mode option to improve the overall user experience.
portfolio.description4: Created a user-friendly interface for seamless text editing and analysis.

testimonial.description1: Developed and curated coding questions for evaluating Data Structure and Algorithms competencies. These questions were utilized in assessments conducted by iMocha.
testimonial.description2: Played a crucial role in the review and refinement of coding questions designed to assess Data Structure and Algorithms proficiency for iMocha assessments.

testimonial.description1: I have solved questions related to Computer Science Subjects.Main subjects were DSA, OS, CN, CD, DBMS.
testimonial.description2: The solution contains step-by-step explanations along with diagrams or even the working code in C/C++.
